languages.text: "Снова в темные коридоры, к кошмарам и затаившимся алым ублюдкам?" {n}Женщина неуверенно смотрит в сторону выхода.{/n} "Конечно, как скажете. Немного придем в себя — сразу уйдем".

traits.locale_text: "Снова в темные коридоры, к кошмарам и затаившимся алым ублюдкам?" {n}Женщина неуверенно сомтрит в сторону выхода.{/n} "Конечно, как скажете. Немного придем в себя — сразу уйдем".
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: "Back into the dark corridors, to the Nightmares and lurking crimson beasts?" {n}The woman gazes hesitantly at the exit.{/n} "Of course, it will be as you say. We'll leave as soon as we catch our breath."
languages.original_text: "Снова в темные коридоры, к кошмарам и затаившимся алым ублюдкам?" {n}Женщина неуверенно смотрит в сторону выхода.{/n} "Конечно, как скажете. Немного придем в себя — сразу уйдем".

traits.locale_text: "Back into the dark corridors, to Nightmares and lurking Crimson monsters?" {n}The woman regards the yawning doorway with a doubtful look.{/n} "Of course, it will be as you say. We'll leave as soon as we catch our breath."
traits.speaker: Prisoner

traits.locale_text: "Back into the dark corridors, to Nightmares and lurking Crimson monsters?" {n}The woman regards the yawning doorway with a doubtful look.{/n} "Of course, it will be as you say. We'll leave as soon as we catch our breath."
traits.speaker: Prisoner

traits.locale_text: "Back into the dark corridors, to the Nightmares and lurking crimson beasts?" {n}The woman gazes hesitantly at the exit.{/n} "Of course, it will be as you say. We'll leave as soon as we catch our breath."
traits.speaker: Prisoner

traits.locale_text: "Back into the dark corridors, to the Nightmares and lurking crimson beasts?" {n}The woman gazes hesitantly at the exit.{/n} "Of course, it will be as you say. We'll leave as soon as we catch our breath."
traits.speaker: Prisoner

traits.locale_text: "Back into the dark corridors, to the Nightmares and lurking crimson beasts?" {n}The woman gazes hesitantly at the exit.{/n} "Of course, it will be as you say. We'll leave as soon as we catch our breath."
traits.speaker: Prisoner

traits.locale_text: "Back into the dark corridors, to the Nightmares and lurking crimson beasts?" {n}The woman gazes hesitantly at the exit.{/n} "Of course, it will be as you say. We'll leave as soon as we catch our breath."
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: “要我们回到那阴暗的回廊？回到那群梦魇身边，还要对付那些潜伏在黑暗中的深红色的畜生？”{n}女人迟疑地望着出口。{/n}“好吧，那就这样吧。我们歇口气就离开。”
languages.original_text: "Back into the dark corridors, to the Nightmares and lurking crimson beasts?" {n}The woman gazes hesitantly at the exit.{/n} "Of course, it will be as you say. We'll leave as soon as we catch our breath."

traits.locale_text: “要我们回到那阴暗的回廊？回到那群梦魇身边，还要对付那些潜伏在黑暗中的深红色的畜生？”{n}女人迟疑地望着出口。{/n}“好吧，那就这样吧。我们歇口气就离开。”
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: «¿De vuelta a los pasillos oscuros, con las pesadillas y las bestias carmesíes al acecho?». {n}La mujer mira a la salida con aprensión.{/n} «Claro, como ordene. Nos marcharemos en cuanto recuperemos el aliento».
languages.original_text: "Back into the dark corridors, to the Nightmares and lurking crimson beasts?" {n}The woman gazes hesitantly at the exit.{/n} "Of course, it will be as you say. We'll leave as soon as we catch our breath."

traits.locale_text: «¿De vuelta a los pasillos oscuros, con las pesadillas y las bestias carmesíes al acecho?». {n}La mujer mira a la salida con aprensión.{/n} «Claro, como ordene. Nos marcharemos en cuanto recuperemos el aliento».
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: 「暗い通路に戻ったら、ナイトメアと、待ち伏せしてる深紅の獣に遭うんじゃない？」{n}女性は戸惑いながら出口を見つめる。{/n}「もちろん、仰るとおりにいたします。一休みしたらすぐにここを発ちますので」
languages.original_text: "Back into the dark corridors, to the Nightmares and lurking crimson beasts?" {n}The woman gazes hesitantly at the exit.{/n} "Of course, it will be as you say. We'll leave as soon as we catch our breath."

traits.locale_text: 「暗い通路に戻ったら、ナイトメアと、待ち伏せしてる深紅の獣に遭うんじゃない？」{n}女性は戸惑いながら出口を見つめる。{/n}「もちろん、仰るとおりにいたします。一休みしたらすぐにここを発ちますので」
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: « Vous voulez qu'on retourne dans les couloirs sans lumière, là où rôdent les cauchemars et les créatures écarlates ? {n}demande la femme en jetant un regard hésitant vers la sortie.{/n} Bien sûr, comme vous voudrez. On partira dès qu'on aura repris notre souffle. »
languages.original_text: "Back into the dark corridors, to the Nightmares and lurking crimson beasts?" {n}The woman gazes hesitantly at the exit.{/n} "Of course, it will be as you say. We'll leave as soon as we catch our breath."

traits.locale_text: « Vous voulez qu'on retourne dans les couloirs sans lumière, là où rôdent les cauchemars et les créatures écarlates ? {n}demande la femme en jetant un regard hésitant vers la sortie.{/n} Bien sûr, comme vous voudrez. On partira dès qu'on aura repris notre souffle. »
traits.speaker: Prisoner

languages.text: "Zurück in die dunklen Gänge, zu den Albträumen und den lauernden purpurnen Bestien?" {n}Die Frau blickt zögernd zum Ausgang.{/n} "Natürlich, ganz wie Ihr wünscht. Wir gehen, sobald wie ein wenig zu Atem gekommen sind."
languages.original_text: "Back into the dark corridors, to the Nightmares and lurking crimson beasts?" {n}The woman gazes hesitantly at the exit.{/n} "Of course, it will be as you say. We'll leave as soon as we catch our breath."

traits.locale_text: "Zurück in die dunklen Gänge, zu den Albträumen und den lauernden purpurnen Bestien?" {n}Die Frau blickt zögernd zum Ausgang.{/n} "Natürlich, ganz wie Ihr wünscht. Wir gehen, sobald wie ein wenig zu Atem gekommen sind."
traits.speaker: Prisoner
